ComicInfo.Title: Alone; The Last Laugh; Do Not Feed; Locked Up; Too Much T.V.
ComicInfo.Summary:
An actor who despises his fans gets his wish to be left alone when he loses the ability to perceive other people.
A man cuts his practical-joking brother's head off after one joke too many.
The aquarium director turns out to be an octopus in human form.
A man keeps his father locked up in the cellar because his father is a gorilla.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ben Brown,George Roussos,Tony DiPreta,Carmine Infantino,Bill Benulis
ComicInfo.Inker: David Gantz,George Roussos,Tony DiPreta,Carmine Infantino,Sy Barry
